name: Brainbits
description:
Brainbits GmbH plans and implements projects both on the Internet and through intranet and web-based applications. We serve our clients' entire value chains, from consulting and conception, to design and technical implementation, all the way through to hosting and support. We accomplish this with about 40 employees.
As an authorized Atlassian Expert Partner, we also support the introduction and development of digital business processes based on JIRA, Confluence and Co.
